channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15850] Localize the configuration change in testCheckTableLocks to reduce flakiness of TestHBaseFsck test suite
item.description:
TestHBaseFsck#testCheckTableLocks changes the "hbase.table.lock.expire.ms" config from 10 minutes default value to 1 ms. This change impacts other tests in the TestHBaseFsck test suite, especially in branch-1.1. 


conf.setLong(TableLockManager.TABLE_LOCK_EXPIRE_TIMEOUT, 1);

The proposed change is to make the configuration change local for testing purpose so that other tests would not be impacted.
item.summary: Localize the configuration change in testCheckTableLocks to reduce flakiness of TestHBaseFsck test suite

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
